member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BannouBundleReader
member.summary: Reads assets from the .bannou bundle format. Supports random access to individual assets via the binary index.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BannouBundleReader.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BannouBundleReader},System.Boolean)
member.param: Whether to leave the stream open when disposed.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BannouBundleReader.ReadHeader
member.summary: Reads and parses the bundle header (manifest and index).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BannouBundleReader.ReadHeaderAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Reads and parses the bundle header asynchronously.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BannouBundleReader.GetAssetEntry(System.String)
member.summary: Gets an asset entry by ID.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BannouBundleReader.GetAssetEntryByIndex(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets an asset entry by index.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BannouBundleReader.ReadAsset(System.String)
member.summary: Reads and decompresses an asset by its ID.
member.returns: The decompressed asset data, or null if not found.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BannouBundleReader.ReadAssetByIndex(System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads and decompresses an asset by its index.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BannouBundleReader.ReadAssetAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Reads and decompresses an asset by ID asynchronously.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BannouBundleReader.ReadAssetByIndexAsync(System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Reads and decompresses an asset by index asynchronously.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BannouBundleReader.ReadAssetToStreamAsync(System.String,System.IO.Stream,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Reads an asset and writes it to a destination stream.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BannouBundleReader.ReadAllAssets
member.summary: Enumerates all assets in the bundle.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BannouBundleReader.ReadAllAssetsAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Enumerates all assets in the bundle asynchronously.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BannouBundleWriter
member.summary: Writes assets into the .bannou bundle format. Bundle structure: 1. manifest.json (uncompressed, JSON) 2. index.bin (binary offset index) 3. assets/*.chunk (LZ4-compressed asset data)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BannouBundleWriter.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BannouBundleWriter})
member.param: The stream to write the bundle to.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BannouBundleWriter.AddAsset(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte},System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyList{System.String},System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyDictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Adds an asset to the bundle.
member.param: Asset data to compress and add.
Optional external asset identifier for cross-system references.
Optional tags for smart bundling decisions.

member.summary: Adds an asset from a stream.
member.param: Optional external asset identifier for cross-system references.
Optional tags for smart bundling decisions.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BannouBundleWriter.Finalize(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyDictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Finalizes the bundle and writes it to the output stream.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BannouBundleWriter.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the writer and releases resources.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BundleIndex
member.summary: Binary index format for fast random access to bundle assets. Stored as index.bin after the manifest. Each entry is 48 bytes in big-endian format.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BundleIndex.EntrySize
member.summary: Size of each index entry in bytes.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BundleIndex.MagicBytes
member.summary: Magic bytes at the start of the index file.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BundleIndex.WriteTo(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Writes the index to a stream.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BundleIndex.ReadFrom(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Reads an index from a stream.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BundleIndex.GetEntry(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the entry at the specified index.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BundleIndexEntry
member.summary: Single entry in the bundle index. 48 bytes total: - 8 bytes: Offset in the bundle file - 8 bytes: Compressed size - 8 bytes: Uncompressed size - 24 bytes: Content hash (first 24 bytes of SHA256)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BundleIndexEntry.Offset
member.summary: Offset of the compressed chunk in the bundle file.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BundleIndexEntry.ContentHashPrefix
member.summary: First 24 bytes of the SHA256 content hash.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BundleIndexEntry.WriteTo(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Writes this entry to a stream.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BundleIndexEntry.ReadFrom(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Reads an entry from a stream.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BundleJson
member.summary: JSON serialization helper for bundle format code. Delegates to BannouJson for consistent serialization settings.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BundleJson.Options
member.summary: Standard JSON serializer options for bundle format. Uses BannouJson.Options as the single source of truth.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BundleManifest
member.summary: Manifest describing the contents of a .bannou bundle. Stored as manifest.json at the start of the bundle.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BundleManifest.FormatVersion
member.summary: Bundle format version for compatibility checking.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BundleManifest.Description
member.summary: Optional description of the bundle contents.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BundleManifest.Version
member.summary: Version string for the bundle contents.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BundleManifest.CreatedAt
member.summary: Timestamp when the bundle was created.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BundleManifest.CreatedBy
member.summary: Account ID of the bundle creator.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BundleManifest.TotalUncompressedSize
member.summary: Total uncompressed size of all assets in bytes.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BundleManifest.TotalCompressedSize
member.summary: Total compressed size of all assets in bytes.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BundleManifest.AssetCount
member.summary: Number of assets in the bundle.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BundleManifest.Assets
member.summary: List of asset entries in the bundle.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BundleManifest.Tags
member.summary: Optional metadata tags for the bundle.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BundleAssetEntry
member.summary: Entry describing a single asset within a bundle.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BundleAssetEntry.ContentType
member.summary: Content type (MIME type) of the asset.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BundleAssetEntry.ContentHash
member.summary: SHA256 hash of the uncompressed content.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BundleAssetEntry.Index
member.summary: Index of this asset in the bundle (0-based). Used to look up offset in index.bin.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BundleAssetEntry.ExternalAssetId
member.summary: External asset identifier for cross-system references.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BundleAssetEntry.Tags
member.summary: Tags associated with this asset for smart bundling decisions.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BundleValidator
member.summary: Validates uploaded bundles for structure, manifest, and content integrity.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BundleValidator.ValidateAsync(System.IO.Stream,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Validates a bundle stream and returns the validation result.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BundleValidatorOptions.MaxAssetCount
member.summary: Maximum number of assets allowed in a bundle.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BundleValidatorOptions.MaxAssetSizeBytes
member.summary: Maximum size of a single asset in bytes.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Bundle.Format.BundleValidationResult.AssetCount
member.summary: Number of assets in the bundle.
